section.49: The Description of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace

hadiths.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Said ibn Abi Said al-Maqburi from his father that Abu Hurayra said, "There are five things from the fitra:cutting the nails, trimming the moustache, removing the hair from the armpit, shaving the pubic region and circumcision
